Get KPoY Leaders Tables

Source: R/kp_ratings_tables.R
kp_kpoy.Rd

Get KPoY Leaders Tables

kp_kpoy(year = most_recent_mbb_season())

Arguments

year

Year of data to pull (earliest year of data available: 2011)

Value

Returns a list of tibbles: "kPoY Rating", "Game MVP Leaders"

Examples

# \donttest{
 try(kp_kpoy(year=2021))
#> [[1]]
#>    rk           player kpoy_rating            team  hgt wgt exp
#> 1   1       Drew Timme       1.915         Gonzaga 6-10 235  So
#> 2   2       Luka Garza       1.903            Iowa 6-11 265  Sr

#> 6   6      Ayo Dosunmu       1.507        Illinois  6-5 200  Jr
